Package effects

Class TradeResourceEffect

java.lang.Object
effects.Effect
effects.TradeResourceEffect
public class TradeResourceEffect
extends Effect
This effect is used to define the property of some yellow cards to allow the player to buy particular resources for a fraction of the initial cost. e.g. : If player has bought the East Trading Cost, he can buy CLAY, STONE, WOOD, or ORE for 1 coin to its right neighbor.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    java.util.ArrayList<Resource> resourcesModified
    List of resources the player can buy for 1 coin instead of 2
